description:
The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!
Le temps des adieux. Départ de Punk Hazard !
Sekibetsu no Toki - Punk Hazard Shukkou!
Время прощаться! Отплытие с Панк Хазард
惜別の時 パンクハザード出航!
